title: WellActivityProgram
description: A complete description of an Activity Program for a unique or a set of Well(s) and/or Wellbore(s)

id.description: Previously called ResourceID or SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object without version.
id.title: Entity ID

kind.description: The schema identification for the OSDU resource object following the pattern {Namespace}:{Source}:{Type}:{VersionMajor}.{VersionMinor}.{VersionPatch}. The versioning scheme follows the semantic versioning, https://semver.org/.
kind.title: Entity Kind

version.description: The version number of this OSDU resource; set by the framework.
version.title: Version Number

acl.description: The access control tags associated with this entity.
acl.title: Access Control List

legal.description: The entity's legal tags and compliance status. The actual contents associated with the legal tags is managed by the Compliance Service.
legal.title: Legal Tags

tags.title: Tag Dictionary
tags.description: A generic dictionary of string keys mapping to string value. Only strings are permitted as keys and values.

createTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which initial version of this OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
createTime.title: Resource Object Creation DateTime

createUser.title: Resource Object Creation User Reference
createUser.description: The user reference, which created the first version of this resource object. Set by the System.

modifyTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which this version of the OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
modifyTime.title: Resource Object Version Creation DateTime

modifyUser.title: Resource Object Version Creation User Reference
modifyUser.description: The user reference, which created this version of this resource object. Set by the System.

ancestry.description: The links to data, which constitute the inputs, from which this record instance is derived.
ancestry.title: Ancestry

meta.description: The Frame of Reference meta data section linking the named properties to self-contained definitions.
meta.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data

RigID.title: Rig ID
RigID.description: A reference to the object that holds the information about the rig used in this drilling program

RiskIDs.title: Risk IDs
RiskIDs.description: A reference to the object that holds the information about the risks that apply to this drilling program (may be too high level for this)

Phases.title: Phases
Phases.description: The set of multiple phases that compose the whole program

items.title: Phase
items.description:
Description of an individual phase that compose the WellActivityProgram. A phase describes the key milestones and is usually based on the major sections of the well or non-well-related work.
(Such as "Acces Well", "Suspend ", "Wellhead Removal "...)

TypeID.title: Type ID
TypeID.description: A reference to the object that holds the information about the type of phase that is described (such as Workover, Completion…)

WellActivityPlanID.title: Well Activity Plan ID
WellActivityPlanID.description: A reference to the object that holds the information about the activity plan for this Well Activity program

SequenceNo.title: Sequence Number
SequenceNo.description: The order that these phases will be executed (is this needed?)

WellboreID.title: Wellbore ID
WellboreID.description: The wellbore to which this drilling program phase refers

RiskIDs.title: Risk IDs
RiskIDs.description: Reference to the objects that holds the information about the risks that apply to this drilling program (may be too high level for this)

Objective.title: Objective
Objective.description: Free text box to describe the objectives from the phase.

BHARunIDs.title: BHA Run IDs
BHARunIDs.description: Reference to the different BHA runs

PlannedLithologyIDs.title: Planned Lithology IDs
PlannedLithologyIDs.description: Reference to the objects that hold the expected lithology designs information about the drilling program for this phase

PlannedCementJobIDs.title: Planned Cement Job IDs
PlannedCementJobIDs.description: Reference to the objects that hold the cementing design information about the drilling program for this phase

EvaluationPlanID.title: Evaluation Plan ID
EvaluationPlanID.description: A reference to the object that holds the evaluation information about the drilling program for this phase.

KickTolerance.title: Kick Tolerance
KickTolerance.description: Volume of a kick that will not cause a pressure exceeding the formation fracture pressure.

MAASP.title: Maximum Allowable Annulus Surface Pressure
MAASP.description: An absolute upper limit for the pressure in the annulus of an oil and gas well as measured at the wellhead. It's a number with pressure units

WellboreArchitectureID.title: Wellbore Architecture ID
WellboreArchitectureID.description: A reference to the object that describes the physical structure of a borehole

WellBarrierElementTestID.title: Well Barrier Element Test ID
WellBarrierElementTestID.description: Identifier of the description from the Well Barrier Element Test to be run

TypeID.title: Type
TypeID.description: The type of well activity program. The default value for this is "Primary" (For example, they may have  "primary" program and "backup" programs)
